description:
The Draggable component implements the widespread
[Sortable.js](https://github.com/RubaXa/Sortable) library.

props.name: data
props.description: Data to bind to the event object

props.name: group
props.description: Group name for sorting between lists

props.name: handle
props.description:
Whether to show a sort handle or, if yes,
which CSS selector to use

props.name: list
props.description: Array of items to sync when sorting

props.name: move
props.description: Callback to determine if an item can be moved

slots.name: default
slots.description: Items to be sortable via drag and drop
